admission_process: Admission to Example University is based on a competitive application process, which includes submitting academic records, recommendation letters, and a personal statement.

events.name: Orientation Day
events.description: Orientation day for new students to get acquainted with the campus, facilities, and university policies.

events.name: Career Fair
events.description: An event where students can network with potential employers and explore job opportunities.

events.name: Cultural Festival
events.description: A celebration of diverse cultures with music, dance, and traditional food.

research_history: Example University has a rich history of groundbreaking research across various disciplines, with notable contributions to fields such as science, technology, and social sciences.

research_works.title: Advancements in Renewable Energy
research_works.description: A study on the latest developments in renewable energy sources and their potential impact on mitigating climate change.

research_works.title: Understanding Artificial Intelligence
research_works.description: An exploration of artificial intelligence, its current capabilities, and ethical implications.
